How to Make a Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich

You may think it is easy to make a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Iâ€™m going to {-|to} tell you how to make a great one. Always use wheat bread. Use creamy peanut butter because the kind with nuts is hard to spread. I like to use {l}Strawberry jam. Grape jelly makes a good sandwich, too{.} Use {+|a} table knife for spreading. Spread about two spoons of peanut butter on one slice of bread. Be sure to cover the whole slice{.} Cover the other slice with about two spoons of jam or jelly. {u}place the peanut butter side on the jelly side and enjoy!
